qas.question: Where did the  coat of arms proper and a lozenge granted to women not develoupe?
Where did men get their coat of arms usually?

context: Also, the tradition of differentiating between the coat of arms proper and a lozenge granted to women did not develop in <a1_0>Poland<a1_0/>. Usually men inherited the coat of arms from <a2_0>their fathers<a2_0/>. Also, the <a0_0>brisure<a0_0/> was rarely used.
